医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
联合治疗可改善临终癌症患者的躁动性谵妄症状德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，与单独使用氟哌啶醇相比，氟哌啶醇和劳拉西泮联合治疗可减轻躁动性谵妄症状，这是晚期癌症患者常见的临终症状。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Combination-treatment-improves-symptoms-of-agitated-delirium-in-end-of-life-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Combination-treatment-improves-symptoms-of-agitated-delirium-in-end-of-life-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8fc3431-2a07-47a8-a31c-6bc89853f146 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 09:54:34 -0400 Combination treatment improves symptoms of agitated delirium in end-of-life cancer patients
联合免疫疗法使转移性黑色素瘤患者获得 10 年生存期根据威尔康奈尔医学和丹娜法伯癌症中心的一份新报告，一项具有里程碑意义的国际试验的长期数据显示，约一半接受免疫检查点抑制剂联合治疗的转移性黑色素瘤患者可以无癌生存 10 年或更长时间。调查人员及其同事。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Combination-immunotherapy-yields-10-year-survival-for-metastatic-melanoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Combination-immunotherapy-yields-10-year-survival-for-metastatic-melanoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8110c32-d3d2-4506-b1b4-c1af04ffc51a Mon, 16 Sep 2024 09:50:07 -0400 Combination immunotherapy yields 10-year survival for metastatic melanoma patients
不推荐使用高剂量维生素 D3 治疗转移性结肠癌由 Dana-Farber 癌症研究所研究人员领导并在美国数百个癌症中心进行的一项双盲随机 3 期临床试验测试了在未经治疗的转移性结直肠癌患者的标准治疗中添加高剂量维生素 D3。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/High-dose-vitamin-D3-cannot-be-recommended-as-treatment-for-metastatic-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/High-dose-vitamin-D3-cannot-be-recommended-as-treatment-for-metastatic-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b0f4f3b-fafe-4180-b1a2-70cd0743acdc Mon, 16 Sep 2024 09:44:30 -0400 High-dose vitamin D3 cannot be recommended as treatment for metastatic colon cancer
减少超加工食品可降低 2 型糖尿病风险伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，食用更多超加工食品 (UPF) 的人患 2 型糖尿病的风险会增加，但可以通过减少食用加工食品来降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Reducing-ultra-processed-foods-can-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Reducing-ultra-processed-foods-can-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce683ce4-e45a-4992-884d-ef40622921f5 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 09:40:33 -0400 Reducing ultra-processed foods can lower type 2 diabetes risk
药物被扔，住房被延迟：无家可归者清扫如何阻碍医疗补助的目标安德鲁·道格拉斯（Andrew Douglass）将他的衣服和物品塞进塑料垃圾袋，五名警察包围了他的营地——在田德隆区的一条熙熙攘攘的人行道上，一顶单调的灰色帐篷塞得满满的，无家可归的人四肢摊开在公共人行道上，有时是吸毒过量的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Tossed-medicine-delayed-housing-How-homeless-sweeps-are-thwarting-Medicaide28099s-goals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Tossed-medicine-delayed-housing-How-homeless-sweeps-are-thwarting-Medicaide28099s-goals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fc33530-4e3f-4553-8eba-c982333cf1f6 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 09:00:00 -0400 Tossed medicine, delayed housing: How homeless sweeps are thwarting Medicaid’s goals
研究发现笑和滴眼药水一样能缓解眼睛干涩一项研究表明，大笑运动对于治疗干眼症与人工泪液一样有效，可以改善症状和泪膜稳定性，且没有副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Laughter-is-as-good-as-eye-drops-in-soothing-dry-eyes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Laughter-is-as-good-as-eye-drops-in-soothing-dry-eyes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e60e94e-5af9-499b-89bb-0b31e4772702 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 06:06:00 -0400 Laughter is as good as eye drops in soothing dry eyes, study finds
研究揭示热带油的双重影响：重要的维生素和危险的副作用对热带油的全面审查揭示了它们的健康益处和风险，强调了椰子油和棕榈油对营养和疾病预防的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-reveals-tropical-oils-dual-impact-Vital-vitamins-and-dangerous-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-reveals-tropical-oils-dual-impact-Vital-vitamins-and-dangerous-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfe9ff32-6157-4a6b-8551-98e5d40a0743 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 05:30:00 -0400 Study reveals tropical oils' dual impact: Vital vitamins and dangerous side effects
研究表明人类和狗之间的大脑同步研究表明，人类和狗在社交互动过程中存在脑间同步，凸显了自闭症相关基因突变对狗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Research-shows-brain-synchronization- Between- humans-and-dogs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Research-shows-brain-synchronization- Between- humans-and-dogs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3caf2423-c8b6-4a7e-bc7b-d42ab5b5ac4b Mon, 16 Sep 2024 04:52:00 -0400 Research shows brain synchronization between humans and dogs
新研究强调膳食抗氧化剂在降低勃起功能障碍风险中的作用研究人员评估了勃起功能障碍与复合膳食抗氧化剂指数之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-research-highlights-role-of-dietary-antioxyants-in-reducing-erectile-dysfunction-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-research-highlights-role-of-dietary-antioxyants-in-reducing-erectile-dysfunction-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a562e97-d562-45f2-8abe-caf216617db1 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 04:36:00 -0400 New research highlights role of dietary antioxidants in reducing erectile dysfunction risk
单剂 MVA-BN 疫苗可提供 58% 的 MPOX 保护研究人员证实了改良的安卡拉-巴伐利亚北欧疫苗对 MPOX 的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Single-dose-of-MVA-BN-vaccine-offers-5825-protection-against-mpox.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Single-dose-of-MVA-BN-vaccine-offers-5825-protection-against-mpox.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1f62639-04f7-4011-853d-24d8c0551671 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 04:20:00 -0400 Single dose of MVA-BN vaccine offers 58% protection against mpox
